TextView.android:text: How many times,has she received TT vaccine so far (since the age of 13 years)?
If you eat Gutka, how many times in a week have you used it?
If you used to or still eat gutka, then how much do you eat in a week?
If you still smoke cigarette (biri or hookah), how many times do you smoke in a day?
If you used to or still smoke, then how many do you smoke in a week?
If you have used tobacco, how many times in a week do you use?
If you have used betel nut (chhalia), how many times in a week have you used it?
